backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing researcher profile data, user profiles, access control, and CRUD operations with authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping new user‑profile and UI functionality to affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purposes of all frontend components and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH‑based light/dark theme variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top‑level React component configuring QueryClientProvider and ThemeProvider and rendering HomePage.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminEditP: Side panel for editing profile, interests, publications, and contact info using tabbed navigation.
frontend/src/components/admin/ContactInf: Form for editing email and affiliation, prefilled from query data and saved via mutation.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProfileEdi: Form to edit name, biography, and profile photo with preview, removal option, and blob upload handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/Publicatio: Editor for adding new publications with title, description, link, and optional PDF upload using mutations.
frontend/src/components/admin/ResearchIn: Component for adding and deleting research interests using query hooks and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: UI section displaying email and affiliation with loading skeletons and conditional rendering.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer with attribution and themed heart icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with navigation, theme toggle, login, owner edit button, and personal info sheet access for non‑owners.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Displays a hero section showing a loading skeleton, a message when no profile exists, or the user's profile with photo and biography.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading state handling and error recovery.
frontend/src/components/PublicationsSect: Renders a publications list with loading skeletons, empty-state messaging, and cards linking to papers or PDFs.
frontend/src/components/ResearchInterest: Shows research interests as badges with loading skeletons and hides the section when no data exists.
frontend/src/components/user/PersonalInf: Sheet UI for editing and saving the caller user's personal info with form state and save mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor based on identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and exposing identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useMutations.ts: Collection of mutation hooks for profile, research interests, and publications, each calling actor methods and invalidating queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useOwnerStatus.ts: Hook that checks whether the authenticated user is the owner by querying the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Query hooks for fetching profile data, research interests, publications, contact info, and caller user profile.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and applying global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page fetching profile, interests, publications, and contact data, then rendering corresponding sections with loading states.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for retrieving, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project state file describing schema versions, existing features, new feature requests, and metadata for the user profile update project.
